projects.title: Church Conference Flyer Series
projects.summary: A cohesive visual series for a multi-day church conference, from save-the-dates to program covers.
projects.description: Designed a full suite of print materials for an annual church conference, including save-the-date postcards, main event flyers, workshop handouts, and program booklet covers. The design used warm, inviting colors and clean typography to reflect the community-focused nature of the event.

projects.title: Instagram Brand Kit for Small Business
projects.summary: Complete Instagram visual identity for a boutique coffee roastery.
projects.description: Created a full brand kit including profile templates, story highlights, post templates, and a content calendar design system. The aesthetic blends earthy tones with bold typography to match the brand's artisanal positioning.

projects.title: Youth Event Poster Collection
projects.summary: Bold, energetic posters for a youth sports and arts summer program.
projects.description: Designed a series of eye-catching posters to promote summer programs including basketball camp, music workshop, and creative arts sessions. Vibrant gradients and dynamic layouts captured the energy of youth culture.

projects.title: Restaurant Social Media Rebrand
projects.summary: Full social refresh for a family-owned Italian restaurant.
projects.description: Refreshed the restaurant's Instagram and Facebook presence with a new visual identity. Designed menu highlights, promotional posts, seasonal campaigns, and engaging stories that increased follower engagement by 40%.

projects.title: Motivational Quote Campaign
projects.summary: Typography-driven quote graphics for a life coach's content library.
projects.description: Designed 50+ motivational quote graphics with consistent branding for a life coach's social media. Each graphic featured clean typography, soft gradients, and a cohesive color palette that reinforced the coach's uplifting message.

projects.title: Real Estate Marketing Kit
projects.summary: Listing templates, open house flyers, and brand materials for a realtor.
projects.description: Created a professional marketing kit including property listing templates, open house flyers, business card design, and social media templates. The sophisticated blue-green palette conveyed trust and professionalism while standing out in a competitive market.

projects.title: Nonprofit Annual Report
projects.summary: Impact-focused annual report design for a local education charity.
projects.description: Designed a visually compelling annual report that highlighted the organization's impact through infographics, photo layouts, and clear data visualization. The design balanced professionalism with approachability to resonate with donors and stakeholders.

projects.title: Fitness Studio Brand Launch
projects.summary: Full brand identity for a new boutique fitness studio.
projects.description: Developed complete brand identity including logo, color palette, typography guidelines, and initial marketing collateral. The energetic yet refined aesthetic appealed to the studio's target demographic of busy professionals seeking wellness.
